scenes.name: Introduction - Alex
scenes.scenario: Looks like another student is approaching you as you wait or classes to start. Time for some introductions!
objectives: I can say hello and goodbye to someone my age or younger.
I can respond to an introduction.

scenes.name: Learning about Alex's Family!
scenes.scenario: Lets' try to get to know Alex and her family a little bit better.
objectives: I can ask and say someone’s nationality.
I can introduce myself and provide basic personal information.
I can say ask about someone’s family.

scenes.name: Alex's Birthday
scenes.scenario: I wonder when Alex's birthday is. It would be a shame to miss her or her family member's birthdays.
objectives: I can ask for soemone's birthday.

scenes.name: Learning about Chen Yang's Family
scenes.scenario: Looks like David and his friend whom you haven't met are hanging out. Let's see what they're up to.
objectives: I can ask for someone's nationality
I can ask about someone's family.
I can ask about other people's professions.

scenes.name: Asking about Chen Yang's Hobbies (Part 1)
scenes.scenario: Let's try to get to know Chen Yang a little better by learning about what she likes to do.
objectives: I can ask others what they like or dislike.

scenes.name: Asking about Chen Yang's Hobbies (Part 2)
scenes.scenario: Now that you've talked to David about what Chen Yang likes (you do remember, right?), let's see if we can invite her to do one of those activities on the weekend.
objectives: I can invite and make plans with someone to do something or go somewhere.

scenes.name: Introduction - David
scenes.scenario: It's the first day of your summer program in Shanghai. There's an awkward looking student standing over there alone. It'd be nice for you to go greet him!
objectives: I can say hello and goodbye to someone my age or younger.
I can introduce myself and provide basic personal information.

scenes.name: Asking about David's Family
scenes.scenario: Now that you know a little bit about David, let's learn more about his family and where they're from.
objectives: I can ask for someone's nationality
I can ask about someone's family.
I can ask about other people's professions.

scenes.name: Asking about David's Schedule
scenes.scenario: You seem really tired recently and want to learn more about David's schedule.
objectives: I can ask about what time my friends do different activities.

scenes.name: Answering questions about your schedule
scenes.scenario: It's 2:30 and classes are over for the day! Looks like David's looking to chat with you before you head home.
objectives: I can tell others the times I do different activities.

scenes.name: Asking about David's Birthday
scenes.scenario: Now that you've been friends with David for a while, I think it's time to figure out his birthday.
objectives: I can ask about birthdays of friends and family.

scenes.name: Asking what kind of food David likes
scenes.scenario: It'd be great to invite David to lunch sometime. I wonder what kind of food he likes.
objectives: I can ask questions about what foods others like and dislike.
I can answer questions about what I like and dislike.

scenes.name: Inviting David to a Meal
scenes.scenario: Now that we know what meals David likes to eat, let's invite him to lunch sometime.
objectives: I can invite and make plans with someone to do something or go somewhere.
I can give times and dates.
I can ask questions about what others like and dislike.

scenes.name: Asking David about his hobbies
scenes.scenario: Lunch with David was great! Let's figure out whether there are any other activities you both enjoy.
objectives: I can invite and make plans with someone to do something or go somewhere.
I can accept or reject an invitation to do something or go somewhere.

scenes.name: Asking David about Chen Yang's interests
scenes.scenario: I wonder what Chen Yang likes to do on the weekend. Maybe David will know.
objectives: I can ask questions about what other people like.

scenes.name: Scheduling everyone to go to the cafe
scenes.scenario: Looks like David, ChenYang, and Alex are hanging out together. Wouldn't it be cool to grab coffee together some time?
objectives: I can invite and make plans with someone to do something or go somewhere.

scenes.name: Answering questions about your trip to Toronto
scenes.scenario: Welcome back from your trip to Toronto! Your friend David has picked you up at the airport and wants to hear all about what you did!
objectives: I can answer questions about what I am doing and what I did.

scenes.name: David's Return from Taiwan
scenes.scenario: Didn't David just come back from Taiwan? Why don't you ask him some questions about his trip on your ride home on the subway?
objectives: I can ask friends about the activities that they did.

scenes.name: Meeting Kevin in the Hallway
scenes.scenario: You are wearing a new pair of shoes. Your classmate Kevin meets you in the hallway.
objectives: I can respond to compliments.

scenes.name: Great Chinese
scenes.scenario: Your father's friend is at your house. He is chatting with you in Chinese.
objectives: I can respond to compliments.

scenes.name: Birthday Party
scenes.scenario: You are going to have a birthday party in your house tomorrow. Invite your boss to your house.
objectives: I can invite someone to dinner.

scenes.name: Starbucks
scenes.scenario: You and your Chinese friend are chatting in Starbucks.
objectives: I can accept invitations.

scenes.name: Starbucks
scenes.scenario: You have a job interview tomorrow. You can't attend tomorrow’s class. Now you are in your teacher’s office to ask to miss tomorrow's class.
objectives: I can ask to leave.

scenes.name: Starbucks
scenes.scenario: Your classmate is talking with you in the classroom. She wants to borrow 200 dollar from you.
objectives: I can ask to leave.

scenes.name: New Store
scenes.scenario: You are having a meeting with your Chinese colleague. You are discussing about the best location for your company’s new store. You have a different opinion from him.
objectives: I can disagree with someone

scenes.name: Loud Music
scenes.scenario: Your neighbor is practicing violin at home at 9 pm. The music is too loud and you cannot fall asleep. You are talking to your neighbor outside her apartment.
objectives: I can ask someone to quiet down

scenes.name: Loud Music
scenes.scenario: You are having dinner with your friend in a restaurant and your friend has drunk a lot of alcohol. Now you want to ask your friend to stop drinking.
objectives: I can tell someone to stop drinking.

scenes.name: Borrow Money
scenes.scenario: Your friend wants to borrow money from you. You are short on cash too. Turn down his request indirectly.
objectives: Decline requests politely.

scenes.name: Borrow Money
scenes.scenario: You are having a meeting with your colleagues. Suddenly, you feel an urge to go to the restroom. What will you say?
objectives: Politely ask to use the restroom

scenes.name: Grandpa's Birthday
scenes.scenario: Your grandfather is having his 70th birthday party. You want to wish him happy birthday.
objectives: Congratulate elders on their birthday!

scenes.name: Friend Commencement
scenes.scenario: You are attending your friend’s commencement.
objectives: Congratulate friends on their commencement

scenes.name: Friend Commencement
scenes.scenario: You bumped into a lady when shopping in the supermarket. The lady had a box of eggs in her hand which were crushed due to your negligence. You need to apologize to her.
objectives: Apologize to someone

scenes.name: Friend Commencement
scenes.scenario: Your friend Harriet has been waiting outside of the Apple Store for hours to purchase the latest iPhone. You want to persuade her to order it online.
objectives: Persuade someone to purchase online.

scenes.name: Friend Commencement
scenes.scenario: You have missed the final exam, but your professor agreed to give you another chance. You want to express your gratitude.
objectives: Apologize to someone

scenes.name: Introduction - Maxwell
scenes.scenario: Back in the dormitory! It's your roommate Maxwell! Looks like he's watching some show on TV.
objectives: I can understand when people introduce themselves.

scenes.name: Pre-assessment - Chinese 1
scenes.scenario: Hey there. I'm M.I.R.I, the Mandarin Intelligence Robot Interpreter. I'm here to help you on your journey to Shanghai!
objectives: I can invite and make plans with someone to do something or go somewhere.
I can ask questions about what other people like.
I can answer questions about what I like and dislike.

scenes.name: Review of Chinese 1
scenes.scenario: Welcome to Shanghai Airport! Looks like your there's a fellow student who's waiting to be picked up. Why don't you head over and chat with him?
objectives: I can introduce myself and provide basic personal information.
I can ask questions about what other people like.
I can answer questions about what I like and dislike.

scenes.name: Ordering Food at a Fast Food Restaurant
scenes.scenario: Hey! It's a fast food restaurant. Weren't you really craving some burgers and fried rice? I don't know if they even serve fried rice, but it doesn't hurt to ask!
objectives: I can order a meal.

scenes.name: Chance Meeting with Ruby at the Supermarket
scenes.scenario: You are shopping in Whole Foods. You bump into your friend Ruby.
objectives: I can greet others at the supermarket.

scenes.name: Greeting a neighbor after work
scenes.scenario: It'a busy day. You are back from school. Your neighbor is back from work. You are both in the elevator.
objectives: I can greet others at the supermarket

scenes.name: Familiar Face on School Campus
scenes.scenario: Doesn't that look like the girl working at the fast food restaurant? Is she also a student?
objectives: I can ask for basic information about another person (age, nationality, birthday).

scenes.name: Introduction - Wang Chao
scenes.scenario: Who's that guy with a ping pong paddle hanging around alone. Why don't you greet him?
objectives: I can say hello and goodbye to someone my age or younger.
I can introduce myself and provide basic personal information.

scenes.name: Talking about your Family with Wang Chao
scenes.scenario: Hey! Here comes that ping pong player. He seems to want to get to know a little bit more about you.
objectives: I can answer questions about my nationality.
I can answer questions about which family members I have.

scenes.name: Wang Chao's Age and Birthday
scenes.scenario: Wang Chao seems to be eager for you to figure out his age and birthday. Why don't you take a guess?
objectives: I can ask about the age and birthdays of other people.

scenes.name: Wang Chao's Ping Pong and Workout Routine
scenes.scenario: We haven't seen Wang Chao in a while. I wonder what he likes to do and what he's been up to.
objectives: I can ask others what they like or dislike.
I can ask what time other people do different activities.

scenes.name: Review of Basic Questions
scenes.scenario: There's a fellow student hanging out at the school cafeteria. Let's meet him!
objectives: I can say or write something about the members of my family and ask about someone’s family.
I can ask and say a home address and e-mail address.
I can ask and say someone’s nationality.
